title: ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 07 Assistant, Junior Engineer Posts
description: TheÂ Employees' State Insurance Corporation, Karnataka (ESIC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07 Assistant Engineer and Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil, Electrical Engineering, can apply for the ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. He...
